A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked this film. I thought it was refreshing and unpredictable. It wasn't a total  rehash of the original trilogy (I tots thought it would) or too out there not to be a Star Wars film. (I know most of you might disagree.) The worst thing about the film is that it felt a little long at times\, especially when it wasn't on Ray and Kylo's storyline but I loved that it made decisions not all films would do\, especially blockbusters. Like when it had not one but several strong women of multiple ages. Most of all I loved that they took a different approach and made something that was interesting and didn't go the I thought it would.
